article.title: Ventura U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Ventura U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Ventura Office Contact Information

Ventura County U.S. Export Assistance Center
333 Ponoma St.
Port Hueneme, CA 93041
Phone: 805-488-4844
Fax: 805-488-7801
Email: gerald.vaughn@trade.gov
Website: http://www.export.gov/california/ventura​

Ventura Staff

Gerald Vaughn, USEAC Director
Phone: 805-488-4844
Fax: 805-488-7801
Email:Gerald.Vaughn@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Industries:Agricultural Chemicals, Agricultural Machinery & Eq., Agricultural Services, Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Apparel, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Building Products, Composite Materials, Computer Services, Computer Software, Computers/Peripherals, Construction Eq., Consumer Electronics, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Defense Industry Eq., Dental Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Electronic Components, Electronics Industry Prod/Test Eq., Employment Services, Films/Videos, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Franchising, General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, Health Care Services, Household Consumer Goods, Industrial Chemicals, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Medica​l Eq., Oil/Gas Field Machinery, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv., Pet Foods/Supp., Plastics Materials/Resins, Plastics Production Machinery, Pleasure Boats/Accessories, Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Robotics, Security/Safety Eq., Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq., Telecommunications Eq., Telecommunications Services, Transportation Serv. (other than Aviation)

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Ventura U.S. Export Assistance Center.
